title: One person airlifted to hospital after helicopter crash on Isle of Wight
description: Emergency services were scrambled to a field near Ventnor on the island at 9.24am on Monday, Hampshire and Isle of Wight Constabulary said.
content:
One person has been airlifted to hospital after a helicopter crashed into a field on the Isle of Wight, emergency services say.

title: Drink enjoyed by millions every day 'could trigger hair loss', experts warn
description: Portuguese researchers found people who regularly consume such drinks could dramatically raise their risk of hair loss.
content:

title: Leicester 'large fire' live updates as busy road is closed
description: Drivers are urged to find alternate routes
content:
